page.title: 11FARMING NEAR PETERLEE
page.content: Some farms are just crop farms.The farm I live on is mixed-animals and crops.We grow barley,oats,potatoes and turnips.My grandparents own the farm and it is called Great Coop House Farm.The animals which we keep are cows,sheep,hens,horses,dogs and cats.We keep the eggs and milk for ourselves.The horses graze in the fields.We have two collie dogs,seven cats and two rabbits. My Dad goes out about 8o'clock in the morning then milks the cows at about 8.15.My grandad takes some of the milk to feed the calves.They have their breakfast next and sometimes they then fetch some hay to feed the calves.All the work is done by my Dad and Grandad.There are two tractors,one is an old one and the other a new one. I do not normally work on the farm.I play with the animals.
